Keywords: Avengers , Martial Artist , Spy , Warp World
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
LAW SCHOOL IN MY MIND, GREEN ROOM TRAINING IN MY BLOOD: FREE: Choose a set of colors and then choose one standard power matching each color. Green Widow can use the chosen powers until your next turn:
*Green and Lime Green
*Black and Red.
I MAKE MY OWN COVER: Leap/Climb. // When Green Widow is given a MOVE action, after resolutions generate a hindering terrain marker in her square and, if she moved 5 squares or less, she may make an attack.
GAMMA-POWERED GRAPPLING: KNOCKBACK. // When Green Widow knocks back one or more characters, she may choose the direction of the knockback and, after resolutions, you may place her adjacent to a character she knocked back.

December 12, 2022
Bat-Phreak
I like GAMMA-POWERED GRAPPLING and it make sense for Close Attacks, but unless I am missing something Jennifer Romanov / Natasha Walters could use it during Ranged Attacks, too. Maybe the text in Units is not correct, and GPG does limit the effect to only occur during Close?
November 3, 2022
Redrover454
Absolute beast of a 100pt character. Her trait and specials work so well together. L/C 5 squares, through blocking if need be, generate a hindering marker, and take Stealth and RCE and shoot 13/5. Her attack special repositioning you and/or your opponent is incredibly useful. When you get based in stealth or from your attack special, take Steal Energy and Flurry. I like this more than her 50pt.
